titles.title: Recognizing and honoring Daniel Penny of West Islip, New York, for his heroism and courage in apprehending a threat to public safety.
Recognizing and honoring Daniel Penny of West Islip, New York, for his heroism and courage in apprehending a threat to public safety.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Accountability.

bill.summary: This resolution recognizes and honors Daniel Penny of West Islip, NY, for his heroism and courage in apprehending a threat to public safety.
